Generation I.Red: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
Generation I.Yellow: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
Generation I.Stadium: It has neither eyes nor a nose. It emits ultrasonic cries that bounce back to its large ears, enabling it to fly safely.

Generation II.Gold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
Generation II.Silver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
Generation II.Crystal: During the day, it gathers with others and hangs from the ceilings of old buildings and caves.
Generation II.Stadium 2: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Zubat remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
Generation III.Sapphire: Zubat avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
Generation III.Emerald: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.
Generation III.FireRed: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echo location to flit about in darkness.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It forms colonies in perpetually dark places and uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

Generation IV.Diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
Generation IV.Pearl: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
Generation IV.Platinum: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
Generation IV.HeartGold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.

Generation V.Black: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
Generation V.White: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
Generation V.Black 2: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surroundings while it flies.
Generation V.White 2: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surroundings while it flies.

Generation VI.X: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
Generation VI.Y: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Zubat remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Zubat avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.

Generation VII.Sun: It sleeps in caves during the day. It has no eyes, so to check its surroundings while flying, it emits ultrasonic waves.
Generation VII.Moon: When exposed to sunlight, they suffer burns. The frequency of their ultrasonic waves can differ slightly from colony to colony.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It has no eyeballs, so it can't see. It checks its surroundings via the ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Their skin is so thin that they'll be burned if sunlight hits them. When it gets cold out, they gather together to warm one another's bodies.
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.

Generation VIII.Sword: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.
Generation VIII.Shield: Zubat live in caves, down where the sun's light won't reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this Pokémon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that it emits from its mouth as it flies.
